text: Bunso Arboretum is a botanical garden located at Bunso in the East Akim District of the Eastern Region in Ghana. ==Location== The arboretum is situated off the Bunso junction on the Accra–Kumasi highway. ==Facilities== The arboretum contains different species of flowers and trees. It has a butterfly sanctuary and a canopy walkway, the second to be built in Ghana. ==See also== * Aburi Botanical Gardens ==References== Category:Botanical gardens in Ghana
title: Bunso Arboretum
